miyanmaraye pawathi bimstek rajya nayaka samuluwata sahabhagi wu janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha ema samuluwa atharathura indiya agamathi man mohan sin samanga eeye (04) dwiparshwika sakachcha pawathwiya.nepito hi miyanmara antharjathika sammanthrana kendraye pawathi mithrashili hamuwe di deratata anyonya washayen wadagath kshethra rasak sambandhayen rajya nayakayo depala sakachcha kala athara ugath padam ha prathisandhana komisame nirdesha kriyathmaka kirima sandaha wana jathika kriyakari salasme pragathiya pilibanda janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha indiya agamathiwaraya danuwath kaleya.rajaya saha uthuru palath sabhawa athara anthar sahayogithawa pilibanda man mohan sin wimasu awasthawe di shri lanka janadhipathiwaraya sandahan kale, siya rajaya uthuru palath sabhawa samanga hamawitama sahayogayen kriya karana bawayi.derate dhiwarayanta adala karunu pilibanda da rajya nayakayo depala sakachcha kalaha.

owunata awashya yuddhaya awasan wimen, 2015 janawari 8 aandu peraliyen labunu nidahasa saha prajathanthrawadi awakashaya awama washayen rakaganimata janadhipathiwaranayen labi athi awasthawa yoda gannataya.wama deshapalanaye haraya aththe anagathaye lokaya wenas kirima sandaha wana dawantha salasum wenuwen wathmanehi athi awama ho nidahasa saha prajathanthrawadi awakashaya kapa kirime arajikawadi deshapalanaye nowana bawa jawipe samajikayan menma ee wata sitina sesu wamanshikayoda libaralwadihuda danithi.wamanshika deshapalanaya thama sahodara janaya wenuwen wana sahodarathwayen ha manawadayawen piripun hrudaya sakshiyak kati kara gaththaki.mema janadhipathiwaranaya ema hrudaya sakshiya yalith wathawak oppu kara sitimata wamanshikayanta labena thiranathmaka awasathawaki.

enam mawage aadaraya labima oba ayithiyak nowana athara eheth eya obata laba dima mawage wagakimaki.ayithiwasikam ha yuthukam athara wenasa mathuwanne methanadiya.api mawakage premaya patha usawi noyamu.wenasa nam eyayi.ese nam mawage aadaraya apata labima waraprasadayaki."aadaraye ulpatha wu amma "yayi kawiyan wananne eheyini.aadaraya ayithiwasikamak wuye nam kawiyaku eya wananu aththe "pema nathiwa walapena wun dan ithin nagitiyaw-mawu pema nathi sakalawidha prathigamithwayama nasa pragathishili mawu parapurak godanagamu " kiyaya.ma adahana hatiyata apata nomile labena adhyapanayada apa ayithiwasikamak nowa rajaya wagakimakin bandi athi deyaki.eheyin eya apa labana waraprasadayaki.ithin me sandarbhaya yatathe api me kathawa idiriyata genayamu.enam adhyapanaya ma labana waraprasadayak yayi yana padanamehi sita genaya.
